DataElement.preferredDefinition: A concept or idea not associated with any specific instance.:A piece of glass or plastic on which different samples have been affixed at separate locations in an ordered manner thus forming a microscopic array.  The samples are usually DNA fragments but may also be antibodies, other proteins, or tissues.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._The words or language units by which a thing is known._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

The samples are usually DNA fragments but may also be antibodies, other proteins, or tissues.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: A concept or idea not associated with any specific instance.

A piece of glass or plastic on which different samples have been affixed at separate locations in an ordered manner thus forming a microscopic array.  The samples are usually DNA fragments but may also be antibodies, other proteins, or tissues.
A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
